product_title: SARTO by Franco Sarto Calvin Wedge Sandal
product_description: A layered wedge and platform wrapped in ropy jute trim add just-right height to a sporty sandal topped with a wraparound ankle strap.
product_details_and_care:
A layered wedge and platform wrapped in ropy jute trim add just-right height to a sporty sandal topped with a wraparound ankle strap.
2" heel; 1/2" platform
Adjustable ankle strap with buckle closure
Leather or genuine calf hair (China) upper/synthetic lining and sole
Imported
Women's Shoes
